Europe plans slow reopening, New York passes peak in coronavirus battle tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734730 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/734730/europe-plans-slow-reopening-new-york-passes-peak-in-coronavirus-battle/story/ Hard-hit European nations began preparing for a slow reopening and the US epicenter New York reported headway Sunday in their battle against the deadly pandemic. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 10:34:45 +0800
Gov. Remulla wants military to enforce ECQ in Cavite as residents continue to violate ECQ rules tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734728 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/734728/gov-remulla-wants-military-to-enforce-ecq-in-cavite-as-residents-continue-to-violate-ecq-rules/story/ "Nakaka-kulo ng dugo na 90% ay nasunod sa patakaran ngunit may 10% na matigas ang ulo at baka sanhi ng lalong pagkalat ng COVID-19. Nakakapikon!" Cavite Gov. Jonvic Remulla said. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 10:15:47 +0800
Agencies or OWWA will shoulder food expenses of OFWs in quarantine ships - PCG chief tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734727 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734727/agencies-or-owwa-will-shoulder-food-expenses-of-ofws-in-quarantine-ships-pcg-chief/story/ Overseas Filipino workers (OFWs) do not have to shell out money for their food while staying in quarantine ships, the commandant of the Philippine Coast Guard (PCG) said Monday. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 10:15:40 +0800
Technology capable of releasing COVID-19 test results in 45 minutes arriving in Philippines --DOH tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734726 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734726/technology-capable-of-releasing-covid-19-test-results-in-45-minutes-arriving-in-philippines-doh/story/ The technology that could release faster laboratory results of COVID-19 tests is arriving in the country on Monday, according to the Department of Health (DOH). DILG slams Anakpawis for 'unauthorized' relief ops: Walang special treatment kahit may congressman kayo tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734725 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734725/dilg-slams-anakpawis-for-unauthorized-relief-ops-walang-special-treatment-kahit-may-congressman-kayo/story/ The Department of the Interior and Local Government on Monday condemned leftist group Anakpawis after some of its volunteers allegedly disobeyed rules of the enhanced community quarantine as it conducted "unauthorized" travel to Norzagaray, Bulacan to bring relief goods. Mon, 20 Apr 2020 09:59:53 +0800
Ina ng sanggol na pumanaw dahil sa COVID-19 sa Lipa, Batangas, na-infect na rin ng sakit tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734723 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/734723/ina-ng-sanggol-na-pumanaw-dahil-sa-covid-19-sa-lipa-batangas-na-infect-na-rin-ng-sakit/story/ Na-infect na rin COVID-19 ang ina ng sanggol na namatay kamakailan dahil sa naturang sakit sa Lipa, Batangas, ayon sa ulat ng Unang Balita nitong Lunes. DA giving away free seeds to NCR residents to ensure food security amid COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734713 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734713/da-giving-away-free-seeds-to-ncr-residents-to-ensure-food-security-amid-covid-19/story/ Free vegetable seeds are being distributed to Metro Manila residents so that they can start urban gardening and grow their own food amid the enhanced community quarantine due to the COVID-19 health crisis, Agriculture Secretary William Dar said Monday.
